DOC.brief_title: Nexplanon Observational Risk Assessment Study ( NORA )
DOC.detailed_description: Nexplanon subdermal contraceptive implant contain progestogen etonogestrel . It provide contraceptive protection three year . In addition progestogen , Nexplanon contain barium sulfate Next Generation Implanon Applicator ( NGIA ) . Nexplanon develop facilitate correct insertion implant use NGIA , extend diagnostic modality localization implant make radiopaque visible via X-ray image X-ray Computerized Tomography ( CT ) . A large , descriptive , prospective , non-interventional , observational cohort study plan follow cohort new user contraceptive implant Nexplanon . Women recruit health care professional complete Nexplanon Clinical Training Program . Baseline follow-up information collect via self-administered questionnaire . Data analysis include characterize frequency specific insertion- , localization- removal-related event via point-estimates event rate well 95 % confidence interval . The impact potential prognostic factor analyze use multivariate regression model and/or stratified analysis .
